label: Region
definition: Geographical area or division, especially part of a country or the world having definable characteristics but not always fixed boundaries.

label: Customer Segment
definition: Group of customers with similar needs, behaviors, or characteristics that a company divides its customers into, for marketing and sales purposes.

label: Product
definition: An item or service offered for sale. Products can be physical objects, services, or digital offerings.

label: Channel
definition: A medium through which a company communicates or distributes its products or services, such as direct, indirect, online, or offline channels.
